title: Co-Design-Based Science Education Curriculum Utilizing Multimodal Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science knowledge and basic proficiency in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Experiment/observation-centered science education courses conducted in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze interaction patterns in physical and digital learning environments using multimodal data collection tools
Learners can systematically derive feedback on learning design by applying co-design methodologies
Learners can perform contextual interpretations by combining classroom observation (CO) data with digital learning analytics (LA) data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
